## DisposableExecutor type

A promise executor that returns a [Dispose](./race-cancellation.dispose.md)<!-- -->.

For example, if it is the promise of a setTimeout, should call clearTimeout.

If it resolves on an event listener, it should uninstall the event listener.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DisposableExecutor<TResult> = (resolve: (value?: TResult | PromiseLike<TResult>) => void, reject: (reason?: unknown) => void) => Dispose;
```
